function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper training and guidance on COVID-19 exposure sources and prevention measures","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to COVID-19 within buildings","Mitigation":"Provide effective guidance and training on COVID-19 prevention measures","Technologies":"Online training platforms, virtual simulations, and educational signage","People":"Building occupants, facility management staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
